LanguageData.BM_SpacerBionicImplants.label: bionic modules
LanguageData.BM_SpacerBionicImplants.description: Produce advanced devices that enhance and extend the functionality of artificial body part replacements.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerBionicImplants.generalRules.rul: subject_story->worked on various body enhancement projects, making improvements to designs thought to have been perfected years ago
subject_story->had an odd obsession with bionic modifications and desired the ability to change one's body at a moment's notice, after years of experimentation that goal was finally achieved
subject_story->was bored of bionic prosthetics being merely metallic replicas of flesh and decided to develop experimental enhancements for them
subject_story->developed a uniquely quick and painless method of modifying bionic prosthetics after their installation
subject_story->created several models of modular bionic prosthetics for non-combat purposes
subject_story->has gotten fired from several jobs in the field of body enhancements due to numerous attempts at implementing changes and modification to produced models without proper authorization

subject_story->volunteered to test experimental models of modular bionic prosthetics and ended up contributing greatly to the project even with little to no technical knowledge on the subject at the time
subject_story->worked on several military combat-enhancements projects, developing a plug-and-play-like method of implant installation
subject_story->became the leader of a body modification project by being the only one with an intact moral compass
LanguageData.BM_MechaniteModules.label: mechanite hosting
LanguageData.BM_MechaniteModules.description: Fabricate bionic modules and implants capable of hosting, maintaining and utilizing small mechanite swarms.
LanguageData.BM_MechaniteModules.generalRules.rulesSt: subject_story->witnessed a criminal emit a strange aura that set nearby law enforcements ablaze
subject_story->was one of the first people to test out experimental models of [bm_mechanite_hosting_devices_attack] modules
subject_story->utilized an EMP-emitting module to wipe out a mechanoid squad with just a flimsy pistol
subject_story->possessed an unusual ability to support squadmates, which later turned out to be the work of an unusual implant
subject_story->controlled a personal swarm of mechanites
subject_story->cheated during a duel by activating an undetectable mechanite-powered implant
subject_story->was killed but later came back to life thanks to an experimental heart implant
LanguageData.BM_ChemicalModules.label: compact chemistry
LanguageData.BM_ChemicalModules.description: Craft bionic modules and implants capable of synthesizing, storing and launching various chemicals.
LanguageData.BM_ChemicalModules.generalRules.rulesStr: subject_story->witnessed a [bm_chemical_devices] module in action when hiding from gunfire
subject_story->requested the assistance of several well-known chemists when developing new models of [bm_chemical_devices] modules
subject_story->took apart a combat implant and repurposed its parts to make an ultra-advanced sugar cube dispenser
subject_story->used a smoke spewer module stolen from a military base when a band's smoke machine stopped working during a concert
subject_story->installed a tox spewer module for self-defense purposes, but ended up activating it on accident on a crowded ship
subject_story->used a burst module to fry nearby hostile mechanoids attacking the colony base
subject_story->was sentenced to participate in a war as a suicide bomber, but came back unscathed several times thanks to a hidden implant
LanguageData.BM_SubpersonaImplants.label: Auxiliary subpersona chips
LanguageData.BM_SubpersonaImplants.description: Produce advanced brain chips that assist the user with various tasks.
LanguageData.BM_SubpersonaImplants.generalRules.rules: subject_story->surgically implanted a subpersona chip into a patient
subject_story->designed and produced a variety of subpersona assistant chips
subject_story->salvaged a subpersona chip from a fallen mechanoid and repurposed it into a portable assistant
